text.0: flow on o thou of lofty thought flow swift in thy beloved form.
text.1: saying i go where dwell the gods.
text.2: preparing what is unprepared and bringing store of food to man.
text.3: make thou the rain descend from heaven.
text.4: with might bestowing power thejuice enters the purifying sieve.
text.6: this is it which in rapid course hath with the rivers wave flowed down.
text.7: from heaven upon the straining cloth.
text.8: inviting him frorh far away and even from near at hand the juice.
text.9: for indra is poured forth as meath.
text.10: in union they have sung the hymn with stones they urge the tawny one.
text.11: sit in the place of sacrifice.
